[ Test 1: Type Conversion ]
    INT   00000000_00000000_00000000_00101011 is converted into SFP   01000100_01011000_00000000
    FLOAT 00111110_10011001_10011001_10011010 is converted into SFP   00111101_00110011_00110011
    SFP   01000100_01011000_00000000 is converted into INT   00000000_00000000_00000000_00101011
    SFP   00111101_00110011_00110011 is converted into FLOAT 00111110_10011001_10011001_10000000

[ Test 2: Addition ]
    01000100_01011000_00000000 + 00111101_00110011_00110011 = 01000100_01011010_01100110

[ Test 3: Multiplication ]
    01000100_01011000_00000000 * 00111101_00110011_00110011 = 01000010_10011100_11001101
